infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Draco requires your location so that we find you once the alert button is pressed
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Draco requires your location so that we find you once the alert button is pressed
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Draco requires your location so that we find you once the alert button is pressed
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Draco requires your location so that we find you once the alert button is pressed
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Draco requires your camera to take a selfie photo of you in order to store it in your profile and to be recognized by our agents.
